blogPost.title: What is it like to work for Obama at the White House? Answer by @KJP46 (Karine Jean-Pierre), White House Principal Deputy Press Secretary. https://t.co/hM3KlYIiXs https://t.co/b6k40z9pBa
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: ホワイトハウスでオバマ大統領の下で働くのはどんな感じですか？Answer by @KJP46 (Karine Jean-Pierre), White House Principal Deputy Press Secretary. https://t.co/hM3KlYIiXs https://t.co/b6k40z9pBa
在白宫为奥巴马工作是一种什么样的感觉？由白宫首席副新闻秘书@KJP46（Karine Jean-Pierre）回答。https://t.co/hM3KlYIiXs https://t.co/b6k40z9pBa
在白宮爲奧巴馬工作是一種什麼樣的感覺？由白宮首席副新聞祕書@KJP46（Karine Jean-Pierre）回答。https://t.co/hM3KlYIiXs https://t.co/b6k40z9pBa

previous.title: Is venture capital the best way to raise money for a small business? Answer by @DavidHart, Co-Founder & COO @screencloud. https://t.co/B9VmmWk5A1 https://t.co/QeAPae4eEk

localize.full_text: 中小企業の資金調達には、ベンチャーキャピタルが最適でしょうか？Answer by @DavidHart, Co-Founder & COO @screencloud. https://t.co/B9VmmWk5A1 https://t.co/QeAPae4eEk
风险投资是为小企业筹集资金的最佳方式吗？回答者：@DavidHart，联合创始人& COO @screencloud。https://t.co/B9VmmWk5A1 https://t.co/QeAPae4eEk
風險投資是爲小企業籌集資金的最佳方式嗎？回答者：@DavidHart，聯合創始人& COO @screencloud。https://t.co/B9VmmWk5A1 https://t.co/QeAPae4eEk

next.title: What role did doctors and pharmaceutical companies play in the current opioid crisis? Answer by Ben Westhoff, author of Fentanyl, Inc. https://t.co/uGuWH8A1YN https://t.co/oDvsvwoviR

localize.full_text: 現在のオピオイド危機において、医師や製薬会社はどのような役割を果たしたのでしょうか？Answer by Ben Westhoff, author of Fentanyl, Inc. https://t.co/uGuWH8A1YN https://t.co/oDvsvwoviR
医生和制药公司在当前的阿片类药物危机中发挥了什么作用？由《芬太尼公司》的作者Ben Westhoff回答。https://t.co/uGuWH8A1YN https://t.co/oDvsvwoviR
醫生和製藥公司在當前的阿片類藥物危機中發揮了什麼作用？由《芬太尼公司》的作者Ben Westhoff回答。https://t.co/uGuWH8A1YN https://t.co/oDvsvwoviR
